title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When attempting to close all saved files, the close command does not always function as expected.
OB: When I click on 'Close all saved' option in the file menu, it does not close all the saved files.
EB: The 'Close all saved' option should close all the saved files without any error or exception. In this case, since no changes have been made to the file, it should close without any prompt or message.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open multiple files in the application.
2. Make sure some of the files are saved.
3. Click on 'File' menu.
4. Select 'Close all saved' option.
5. Verify if all the saved files are closed without any prompt or error message.
